id

desc an advanced rules name
source

desc a cel syntax expression that contains the advanced rule’s conditions
wafadvancedruleaction
type str
default actionunspecified
desc the actions that the waf takes when an advanced rule is triggered

 actionunspecified the action is undetermined
  block the waf blocked the request
  allow the waf allowed the request
  captcha the waf presented the user with a captcha
  handshake the waf performed automatic browser validation
  monitor the waf monitored the request but took no action
enabled
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not an advanced waf rule is enabled
wafadvancedrulestatuscode
type str
default statuscodeunspecified
desc a custom http status code that the waf returns if a rule blocks a request
actionduration
type str
desc how long a rules block action will apply to subsequent requests

durations only apply to rules with block actions
desc

advancedruleexecutionphase
type str
default executionphaseunspecified
desc the waf request/response phase for applying the advanced rule

 executionphaseunspecified the phase to apply an advanced rule is unspecified
  access the advanced rule applies to request phase request headers and body available
  headerfilter the advanced rule applies to response headers phase
  bodyfilter the advanced rule applies to response body phase
desc an advanced waf rule applied to a site

unlike predefined policies advanced rules are provided by the user for flexible waf functionality
